医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现食物过敏者的生活质量存在性别差异研究人员检查了免疫球蛋白 E (IgE) 相关食物过敏患者及其护理人员的健康相关生活质量 (HRQL) 与生物性别之间的相关性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Study-finds-gender-disparity-in-quality-of-life-for-individuals-with-food-allergies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Study-finds-gender-disparity-in-quality-of-life-for-individuals-with-food-allergies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d907f27e-b39a-407a-8832-2e4cad4e725a Fri, 09 Feb 2024 08:45:00 -0500 Study finds gender disparity in quality of life for individuals with food allergies
研究表明，回收的食物垃圾可能受到药物残留物的污染新研究表明，回收的食物垃圾可能受到药物残留物的污染。好消息是，沼气沼渣中培养的真菌对这些污染物的吸收极少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Recycled-food-waste-may-be-contamerated-with-pharmaceutical-residues-research-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Recycled-food-waste-may-be-contamerated-with-pharmaceutical-residues-research-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c3678f09-4734-4841-b4bd-f42b43af3ec9 Fri, 09 Feb 2024 08:29:25 -0500 Recycled food waste may be contaminated with pharmaceutical residues, research reveals
使用勃起功能障碍药物的男性患阿尔茨海默病的可能性较小伦敦大学学院研究人员领导的一项新研究发现，通常用于治疗勃起功能障碍的药物可能会降低患阿尔茨海默病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Men-using-erectile-dysfunction-drugs-less-likely-to-develop-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Men-using-erectile-dysfunction-drugs-less-likely-to-develop-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9bfbd216-31f0-4559-bda8-8e6760036688 Fri, 09 Feb 2024 08:20:35 -0500 Men using erectile dysfunction drugs less likely to develop Alzheimer's disease
MHRA 授权 COVID-19 疫苗：Comirnaty 和 Nuvaxovid 获得批准在发现 Comirnaty Omicron XBB.1.5 30 微克/剂量（单剂量小瓶）符合英国监管机构的安全、质量和有效性标准后，药品和保健品监管机构 (MHRA) 批准更改其许可证。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/MHRA-authorizes-COVID-19-vaccines-Comirnaty-and-Nuvaxovid-gain-approvals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/MHRA-authorizes-COVID-19-vaccines-Comirnaty-and-Nuvaxovid-gain-approvals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=51394954-97f7-435f-9e22-02e3357bf853 Fri, 09 Feb 2024 08:15:10 -0500 MHRA authorizes COVID-19 vaccines: Comirnaty and Nuvaxovid gain approvals
研究发现，年长的亚裔美国人对参加 MRI 研究犹豫不决罗格斯大学健康中心主导的一项研究表明，与白人同龄人相比，亚裔美国人参与涉及核磁共振成像的健康研究的可能性较小，解决这种犹豫可能会改善研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Older-Asian-Americans-hesitant-to-participate-in-MRI-research-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Older-Asian-Americans-hesitant-to-participate-in-MRI-research-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2d1be5d5-c4cc-42e0-807e-47eb8dda6edb Fri, 09 Feb 2024 08:06:49 -0500 Older Asian Americans hesitant to participate in MRI research, study finds
研究表明，分手后女性抗抑郁药物的使用量比男性更大一项新研究探讨了经历离婚、同居分居或丧亲之痛的 50-70 岁芬兰成年人的抗抑郁药物使用模式，以及随后重新伴侣前后的使用趋势。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Women-experience-larger-increase-in-antidepressant-use-after-break-up-than-men-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Women-experience-larger-increase-in-antidepressant-use-after-break-up-than-men-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d1018753-6484-44a3-a53c-e0b9db82a3be Fri, 09 Feb 2024 07:20:00 -0500 Women experience larger increase in antidepressant use after break-up than men, study suggests
难道我们根本就不关心老人吗？老年人权益倡导者预测，新冠肺炎（covid-19）大流行将为美国敲响警钟：无可争议的证据表明，美国在照顾弱势老年人方面做得不够。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Do-we-simply-not-care-about-old-people.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Do-we-simply-not-care-about-old-people.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ed208ffb-ed57-45da-84a2-1932df30afe2 Fri, 09 Feb 2024 05:54:00 -0500 Do we simply not care about old people?
研究发现 Stapokibart 有望减少季节性过敏患者的鼻塞Stapokibart 作为季节性过敏性鼻炎 (SAR) 患者的疗效和安全性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Stapokibart-shows-promise-in-reducing-nasal-congestion-in-seasonal-allergy-病人-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Stapokibart-shows-promise-in-reducing-nasal-congestion-in-seasonal-allergy-病人-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2ce63e90-dedc-4c20-862f-a5e54024aa76 Fri, 09 Feb 2024 04:59:00 -0500 Stapokibart shows promise in reducing nasal congestion in seasonal allergy patients, study finds
研究发现，针对焦虑儿童的数字 CBT 效果与传统方法相当，并且成本更低如果数字增强、治疗师支持、家长主导的 CBT 是一种具有成本效益且临床有效的替代方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Study-finds-digital-CBT-for-children-with-anxiety-delivers-on-par-with-traditional-methods-lowers-costs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Study-finds-digital-CBT-for-children-with-anxiety-delivers-on-par-with-traditional-methods-lowers-costs.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a34b6153-6ea5-49da-909a-1df2335eeac5 Fri, 09 Feb 2024 04:29:00 -0500 Study finds digital CBT for children with anxiety delivers on par with traditional methods, lowers costs
疫苗对感染艾滋病毒的孕妇是安全的，但免疫反应降低eClinicalMedicine 的一项荟萃​​分析发现，疫苗对于感染艾滋病毒的孕妇来说是安全的，与未感染艾滋病毒的孕妇相比，疫苗的免疫原性降低，但不良事件没有增加，这凸显了将其纳入疫苗试验的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Vaccines-safe-for-pregnant-women-with-HIV-but-show-reduced-immune-response.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Vaccines-safe-for-pregnant-women-with-HIV-but-show-reduced-immune-response.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4e15e270-cf55-4e5e-8e09-2904ed71b129 Fri, 09 Feb 2024 00:36:00 -0500 Vaccines safe for pregnant women with HIV but show reduced immune response
